title: Design Thinking-Based Technical Skill Enhancement Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Science Subject Knowledge and Secondary Education Experience
context.additional_context: Practical workshop for in-service secondary science teachers to enhance technology-integrated learning design skills in smartphone-dominant limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design technology-enhanced learning scenarios by applying the design thinking process
Learners can analyze learner needs and derive creative problem-solving solutions using interview techniques
Learners can produce science curriculum-integrated lesson materials using smartphone-based tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
